All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
AddAppointment
Controller for adding a new appointment
AddCustomer
Controller for adding a new customer
Alerts
Alerts class used to display alerts for all errors
Appointments
Contact class is used to retrieve and present appointment information pulled from the database
AreaReport
Controller for displaying report based on appointment country
ContactReport
Controller for displaying reports based on contact
Contacts
Contact class is used to retrieve and present contact information pulled from the database
Countries
Countries class is used to retrieve and present Country information pulled from the database
Customers
Contact class is used to retrieve and present customer information pulled from the database
DBConnect
Handles connect/disconnecting from database
Divisions
Contact class is used to retrieve and present division information pulled from the database
Logger
Logger class is used to catalog login information from the login attempts
LoginScreen
Controller for handling login authentication
Main
This class creates main application
MainScreen
Main controller for adding/editing appointments and customers
ModifyAppointment
Controller for updating existing appointment
ModifyCustomer
Controller for updating existing customer
MonthlyReport
Controller for displaying report based on month
Reports
Contact class is used to retrieve and present report information pulled from the database
SceneSwitcher
Handles switching between screens
timeConverter
Time converter class is used to transform times retrieved from the database and sent to the database
Users
Contact class is used to retrieve and present user information pulled from the database
WeeklyReport
Controller for displaying report based on week
